value:
The food here is delicious... But we
need to talk about the portions. I had
to eat eight helpings at breakfast...

I was separated from my traveling
companions and lost my way...
Thank you for feeding me.

By my estimate I've only had three
portions of food today. I'm so
hungry...

I'm no good at running, much less
marching. Physical exertion makes
me so hungry...I might just faint.

Hello, $Nu...$k$pOf course I remember you.
You gave me so many treats.

For all of those lovely meals,
I owe $Nf...

Hmm... I detect something
delectable... We can't stop
now... We must find it!

I'm... I'm sorry. I got a little dizzy
there. It happens all the time.

Hold on... Kinda dizzy... And so
hungry... Can't move...

You're too kind...but what I really
wanted is a snack.

My name is Ilyana. I'm a traveling
mage. Sorry, but...I'm about to
faint... Can you spare a bite to eat?

Thank you for always finding food
for me when I need it. I know that's
pretty much all the time...$k$pI never had much growing up, so I
got used to relying on the generosity
of others.$k$pThat has its limits, of course... I
can put away a fortune in food.
Not everybody is so understanding.$k$pHere, though... I can eat my fill, and
nobody even bats an eye. It's like
a dream come true!$k$pLet me stay and feast with you, and
I'll be sure to do everything I can
to help you out. It's a win-win!
えい…
それっ
ああっ…
もうだめ…
Excuse me...
So...hungry...
Kinda dizzy...
Let me pass...
I'll...just...
Sigh...
My name is Ilyana. I'm a traveling mage.
...Yes? Do you have something for me? Food, maybe?
When I left home, I was all alone...I couldn't find work. Those were hungry times...
I'm not picky—I'll take any food you have...
I'm just...you know. I'm hungry.
You summoned me to this smörgåsbord. I'll never forget you...
There's so much delicious food here, it's like...heaven...
I'm not picky.
*sigh*
Getting kinda hungry...
